name: Fireside chat with Aya Miyaguchi
description: A warm chat with Aya Miyaguchi about the values of Ethereum, the potential impact of Ethereum, and the Turkish ecosystem.

speakers.name: Aya Miyaguchi
speakers.bio: Executive Director and Eclectic Dreamer of the Ethereum Foundation.  Ayaâ€™s goal is to help Ethereum maintain its soul as an Infinite Garden, or a decentralized creative space that is open-source, inclusive and permissionless.
